trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Tucker
There were no other sightings in Tucker on or around June 3rd 2003
Summary: it was metalic and bright lit-silver in color
divs: Sighting DetailsI was having trouble sleeping. I always look out my bedroom window. Looked up into the open space between trees. I saw a bright silver object it moved to theEast was very bright, It blinked off, then appeared again moved below the firstsighting, then disapeared again then reappeared to its original position. Itmoved fast and dissapeared. Was metalic and bright lit.Different from anyotherthat I had seen. I was having sleep problems. Everyone in the house was sleepingeven my cats. I went back in and looked out the window to see if the object hadreappeared it was gone.
